White, Jim。“拟议邮件协议。”征求意见稿 524。斯坦福研究所，加利福尼亚州门洛帕克，1973 年 6 月 13 日。

Zimmermann，H. 和 M. Elie。“异构计算机网络的拟议标准主机​​到主机协议：传输协议。”国际网络工作组 43 的记录，1973 年 12 月。

Zimmermann, H., and M. Elie. “Proposed Standard Host-Host Protocol for Heterogeneous Computer Networks: Transport Protocol.” Notes of the International Network Working Group 43, December 1973.

电子档案

Electronic Archives

明尼苏达大学查尔斯·巴贝奇研究所信息处理历史中心。与计算历史相关的大型档案收藏。更多信息可通过 CBI 网站

http://cbi.itdean.umn.edu/cbi/welcome.html 或发送电子邮件至

bruce@fs1.itdean.umn.edu 获取。

Charles Babbage Institute, Center for the History of Information Processing, University of Minnesota. Large archival collection relating to the history of computing. More information can be obtained via the CBI Web site at

http://cbi.itdean.umn.edu/cbi/welcome.html or via e-mail addressed to

bruce@fs1.itdean.umn.edu.

计算机博物馆，马萨诸塞州波士顿。收集了大量与计算机历史相关的资料，包括有关电子邮件早期发展的消息组档案。该档案可通过主页

http://www.tcm.org/msgroup 获取。

Computer Museum, Boston, Massachusetts. Large collection relating to the history of computing, including the archives of the Message Group concerning the early development of e-mail. The archive is available via the homepage at

http://www.tcm.org/msgroup.

南加州大学信息科学研究所。该馆藏包括最新的互联网标准、协议、征求意见稿 (RFC) 和各种其他技术说明的索引和测试，可通过 ISI 网站获取：http://www.isi.edu。一些早期的 RFC 无法以电子形式获取，但 RFC 编辑 Jon Postel 以细致的方式离线存档。可搜索的存档位于 http://info.internet.isi.edu:80/in-notes/rfc。

Information Sciences Institute, University of Southern California. Collection includes upto-date indexes and tests of Internet standards, protocols, Requests for Comments (RFCs), and various other technical notes available via the ISI Web site: http://www.isi.edu. Some of the earlier RFCs are not available electronically, but are archived off-line in meticulous fashion by RFC editor Jon Postel. A searchable archive is maintained at http://info.internet.isi.edu:80/in-notes/rfc.

俄亥俄州立大学计算机与信息科学系。CIS Web 服务器通过 http://www.cis. ohio-state.edu:80/hypertext/information/rfc.html 提供对 RFC 以及与 Internet 相关的各种其他技术和历史文档的访问。

Ohio State University, Department of Computer and Information Science. The CIS Web Server offers access to RFCs and various other technical and historical documents related to the Internet via http://www.cis. ohio-state.edu:80/hypertext/information/rfc.html.

致谢

Acknowledgments

这本书的灵感来源于 Bolt Beranek 和 Newman 工程师的一个想法。1993 年末，当我们第一次开始考虑写一本书时，记忆已经模糊了，Frank Heart 和其他人对 BBN 在创建原始 ARPANET 中所起的重要作用很感兴趣。该公司不仅向我们开放了档案，并在各方面给予合作，还资助了该项目，同时同意不对书的内容进行控制。当时 BBN 的首席图书管理员 Marian Bremer 打了第一个电话，促成了这本书的出版。Cary Lu 和 John Markoff 敦促我们接受这个项目。

This book grew out of an idea that originated with engineers at Bolt Beranek and Newman. Memories were growing fuzzy in late 1993, when we first started thinking about doing a book, and Frank Heart and others were interested in having BBN’s considerable role in the creation of the originalARPANETrecorded. Not only did the company open its archives to us and cooperate in every way but it helped fund the project as well, while agreeing to exercise no control over the content of the book. Marian Bremer, then BBN’s head librarian, made the initial phone call that led to the book. Cary Lu and John Markoff urged us to take on the project.

Helen Samuels 和麻省理工学院档案馆的工作人员提供了极大的帮助，明尼苏达大学查尔斯·巴贝奇研究所信息处理历史中心的助理档案管理员 Kevin Corbitt 也提供了极大的帮助。我们非常感谢 John Day、Larry Roberts、Al Vezza 和 John Shoch 为我们翻找旧箱子。Deborah Melone 和 Bob Menk 发送了 BBN 的照片和档案。《连线》杂志的 Kevin Kelly 和 Martha Baer 让我们专注于电子邮件的历史。和蔼可亲的导师 Noel Chiappa 在电话中花了几个小时解释路由表和 RFNM 的工作原理等技术要点。

以下人员同意我们进行长时间的采访：Wes Clark、Vint Cerf、Bob Kahn、Severo Ornstein、Bob Taylor、Larry Roberts、Jon Postel、Frank Heart、Alex McKenzie、Dave Walden、Ben Barker、Donald Davies、Paul Baran、Len Kleinrock、Steve Lukasik、Steve Crocker 和 Bob Metcalfe。Louise Licklider、Bill McGill、John Swets 和 Karl Kryter 与我们分享了他们对 JCR Licklider 的回忆，Mitch Waldrop 帮助填补了一些空白。Phil Patton 委托我们查阅他的 Barber Associates 研究报告副本，我们对此深表感谢。Brian Reid、Gary Chapman、Kevin Buckley、Dave Farber 和 Colonel Clair Shirey 让我们就各种相关主题征求他们的意见。IEEE 的 Marsha Longshore 向我们发送了技术文章，Earl Swartzlander 借给我们他的 IEEE 计算机历史年鉴副本。史蒂夫沃尔夫帮助我们理解了 20 世纪 80 年代发生的那些错综复杂的事件，特别是有关 NSF 在互联网发展中所扮演的角色。

Helen Samuels and the folks at MIT archives were immensely helpful, as was Kevin Corbitt, assistant archivist at the Charles Babbage Institute, Center for the History of Information Processing, at the University of Minnesota. We are grateful to John Day, Larry Roberts, Al Vezza, and John Shoch for digging around in old boxes for us. Deborah Melone and Bob Menk sent photographs and archives from BBN. Kevin Kelly and Martha Baer atWiredmagazine got us focused on the history of e-mail. Noel Chiappa, good-natured tutor, spent hours on the telephone explaining, among other technical points, how routing tables and RFNMs work.

The following people allowed us to interview them at length: Wes Clark, Vint Cerf, Bob Kahn, Severo Ornstein, Bob Taylor, Larry Roberts, Jon Postel, Frank Heart, Alex McKenzie, Dave Walden, Ben Barker, Donald Davies, Paul Baran, Len Kleinrock, Steve Lukasik, Steve Crocker, and Bob Metcalfe. Louise Licklider, Bill McGill, John Swets, and Karl Kryter shared their memories of J. C. R. Licklider with us, and Mitch Waldrop helped fill in some blanks. Phil Patton entrusted us with his copy of the Barber Associates study, for which we are grateful. Brian Reid, Gary Chapman, Kevin Buckley, Dave Farber, and Colonel Clair Shirey let us pick their brains on various relevant topics. Marsha Longshore of IEEE sent technical articles our way, and Earl Swartzlander lent us his copies of the IEEE computer history annals. Steve Wolff helped us understand the often labyrinthine events that took place in the 1980s, particularly concerning NSF’s role in the development of the Internet.

文特·瑟夫 (Vint Cerf)、莱曼·查平 (Lyman Chapin)、史蒂夫·克罗克 (Steve Crocker)、彼得·丹宁 (Peter Denning)、弗兰克·哈特 (Frank Heart)、鲍勃·卡恩 (Bob Kahn)、约翰·凯利 (John Kelley)、拉里·兰德韦伯 (Larry Landweber)、史蒂文·利维 (Steven Levy)、汉克·朗 (Hank Long)、保罗·麦克琼斯 (Paul McJones)、亚历克斯·麦肯齐 (Alex McKenzie)、彼得·普鲁斯 (Peter Preuss)、拉里·罗伯茨 (Larry Roberts)、埃纳尔·斯特弗鲁德 (Einar Stefferud)、鲍勃·泰勒 (Bob Taylor)、约翰·维塔尔 (John Vittal)、戴夫·沃尔登 (Dave Walden) 和苏珊·扎卡里亚斯 (Susan Zacharias) 审阅了手稿的全部或部分内容，这些内容均已完成。埃弗里特·哈夫纳 (Everett Hafner) 是一位完美主义者和勤奋的人，他让我们保持诚实。理查德·里昂 (Richard Lyon) 敏锐的头脑和细心的笔法使手稿受益匪浅。当然，错误的责任由我们承担。

The manuscript was read in whole or in part in various stages of completion by Vint Cerf, Lyman Chapin, Steve Crocker, Peter Denning, Frank Heart, Bob Kahn, John Kelley, Larry Landweber, Steven Levy, Hank Long, Paul McJones, Alex McKenzie, Peter Preuss, Larry Roberts, Einar Stefferud, Bob Taylor, John Vittal, Dave Walden, and Susan Zacharias. Everett Hafner, perfectionist and workhorse, kept us honest. The manuscript benefited tremendously from the keen mind and careful pen of Richard Lyon. Responsibility for errors, of course, rests with us.

我们的王牌研究助理 Jon Coifman 在手稿准备的最后阶段提供了巨大帮助，Andrea Perry 是一位细心的校对员。Julian Darley 帮助输入更改。Denise Bugg 转录了许多磁带。Pete Lewis 用他的 Wacom 手写板挽救了局面。Sigrid Cerf 为我们提供了丰富多彩的故事和许多明智的建议。编写《Retrieve It!》的 Matt Pallakoff 帮助我们每周节省​​了几个小时的工作时间。还要感谢 John Aielli，谁知道为什么呢。

Jon Coifman, our ace research assistant, helped immensely with the final stages of the manuscript preparation, and Andrea Perry was a careful proofreader. Julian Darley helped type in changes. Denise Bugg transcribed many tapes. Pete Lewis saved the day with his Wacom Pen Tablet. Sigrid Cerf supplied us with colorful stories and much sage advice. Matt Pallakoff, who wrote Retrieve It!, helped shave hours off our work weeks. And thanks to John Aielli, who knows why.

Zoë Mark Lyon 虽然忙于自己的书，但她每天都会抽出时间来鼓舞我们的士气，逗我们开心。Denny Lyon、Amy Goodwin、Kelly McRee、Ellen Lyon 和 Jeremy Lyon 勇敢地承担了额外的照顾孩子的任务。Sherry Turkle、Sarah Hafner、Teresa Carpenter、Terry Evers、Robert Wallich、Tony Bianco 和 Carol Flake 倾听了我们的心声。Ladd Hanson 和 Mark McFarland 帮助解决了技术问题。George Hackett 和 Bob Berdahl 是长期忍受痛苦的老板，违背了他们的判断。Ann Walther、Lindsey Lane 和 Tom Ferguson（邮资计费员）不止一次伸出援手。Paulina Borsook 一如既往地提供了宝贵的见解。

Zoë Mark Lyon, though busy with her own book, took time out of her schedule every single day to bolster our spirits and make us laugh. Denny Lyon, Amy Goodwin, Kelly McRee, Ellen Lyon, and Jeremy Lyon gamely took on extra child care. Sherry Turkle, Sarah Hafner, Teresa Carpenter, Terry Evers, Robert Wallich, Tony Bianco, and Carol Flake lent a sympathetic ear. Ladd Hanson and Mark McFarland helped with technical troubles. George Hackett and Bob Berdahl were long-suffering bosses, against their better judgment. Ann Walther, Lindsey Lane, and Tom Ferguson (keeper of the postage meter) came to the rescue more than once. Paulina Borsook offered her customary invaluable insights.

在我们旅行期间，Chris Paine、Katherine Magraw、Holly Myers、Kirk Neely、Lisa Van Dusen、Candace Thille、Julie Graham、Debbie Yager、Katherine 和 Irving Gottsegen、Jane 和 Frank Heart、Barry Muhlfelder、Jane Anderson 和 Eric Ponteri 为我们提供了栖身之所。

During our travels, Chris Paine, Katherine Magraw, Holly Myers, Kirk Neely, Lisa Van Dusen, Candace Thille, Julie Graham, Debbie Yager, Katherine and Irving Gottsegen, Jane and Frank Heart, Barry Muhlfelder, Jane Anderson, and Eric Ponteri put a roof over our heads.

和往常一样，文学经纪人 John Brockman 和 Katinka Matson 知道那里有一本书。西蒙舒斯特出版社的出色编辑 Bob Bender 知道那本书应该是什么。他出色的助手 Johanna Li 从未让我们失望。——Katie

Hafner

As usual, literary agents John Brockman and Katinka Matson knew there was a book there. Bob Bender, our marvelous editor at Simon & Schuster, knew what that book should be. His wondrous assistant, Johanna Li, never let us down.

—Katie Hafner

katieh@zilker.net

 

 

—Matthew Lyon m_lyon@ utxvms.cc.utexas.edu
